newsitem.title: USA: Amedisys trades on Nasdaq National Market.
newsitem.headline: Amedisys trades on Nasdaq National Market.

text.p: Amedisys Inc said Tuesday that its common stock began trading on the Nasdaq National Market today.
Amedisys said the stock will continue to trade under the symbol "AMED." The issue had been trading on Nasdaq's SmallCap Market.
Amedisys is a regional diversified health care corporation with operations in home health care, medical staffing, outpatient surgery and physician practice management.
